snippet.title: Sonic - Project Hero 2019 Update - Tails
snippet.description:
NOTE: This video was unlisted before May 12th, 2019.
-------------------------------

The second section of the 2019 update, featuring Miles "Tails" Prower - Sonic's sidekick and best friend. In Project Hero he's both a potential partner and his own playable character!

If you've got anything to ask/say/suggest/whatever, feel free to comment down below! I'll try to answer to everything accordingly.
-------------------------
Music: Windy Hill ...for Windy Valley - Sonic Adventure.
